mapper.select: SELECT cost.COST, cost.BEFORECOST, FROM_UNIXTIME(cost.COSTTIME,"%Y/%m/%d") COSTTIME, CONCAT("Day",FROM_UNIXTIME(cost.COSTTIME,"%d")) DAYKEY, src.ID SRCID FROM hm_pub_role_source role LEFT JOIN hm_crm_source src ON src.id = role.SOURCEID AND src.COMPANYID = role.COMPANYID LEFT JOIN hm_crm_cost cost ON cost.SRCID = role.SOURCEID AND cost.COMPANYID = role.COMPANYID WHERE cost.COMPANYID=#{companyId} and FROM_UNIXTIME(cost.COSTTIME,"%Y/%m")=#{month} and role.ROLEID in ((select staff.ROLEID from hm_pub_staff_role staff where staff.STAFFID=#{staffId} )) and src.ID is not null
mapper.update: update hm_crm_cost set rate=#{rate},beforecost=cost/(1+#{rate}) where companyId=#{companyId} and srcId in (${srcIds}) and costtime between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.select: select costtime day,srcId from hm_crm_cost where companyId=#{companyId} and srcId in (${srcIds}) and costtime between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO hm_crm_cost( srcid, costtime, rate, createtime, updatetime, companyid )VALUES
( #{item.srcId}, #{item.day}, #{item.rate}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()), UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()), #{item.companyId} )
mapper.select: select id from hm_crm_cost where costtime=#{time} and srcId= #{srcId} and companyId=#{companyId}
